title: Placed in Low Priority Queue
body:
When 4 other people in my last game also dc'd for around 8-15 minutes at various times.

Gr8 

I get to twiddle my thumbs for 2 hours because of shitty servers. 

Guess what my last dc was as well. I even made a thread about that as well, with screenshots! 

That was 4-5 days ago as well.

East coast blows....

Edit: Even have a link. Same problem as before.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hvEIVQn6-cant-log-on

replies.body: I got leaverbuster just because of afk 3-5 minutes in a AI game. 2 hours gifted to riot  after I reinstalled league for 6 hours.
